song1.title: Can I still get into the fluffy little space in your heart?
lyrics:
All of these eyes are into you
And I like how you are
So unaware of it
You're just like an abstract palette
I don't know why

I thought the star is too shy to come out
Cause you're full of beauty
But I forgot it's Jakarta skies
So, pollutions, you know?
But it's okay my knee still hurts anyway

Although you're just sittin' there
But it feels like you got the power to make me buy you roses
Yet I can't do anything with this empty wallet
Can I still get into the fluffy little space in your heart?

Must be nice
If you become my new queen
Even though
I know my imagination
Will only tattoo
A wound in my heart

I know you're just sittin' there
But it feels like you got the power to make me fall in love oh
Can I still get into the fluffy little space in your?

song2.title: Honesty & Falsity
lyrics:
Girl, you look like an aloe vera, i mean
I like how your blouse suits your brown eyes
You want me to be honest
But if i did
Won't it be boring?

I'm not good at saying my real thought
I said you're so pretty i'm thinking of my Grandma's chair
If i'm being honest
Won't it become weird?

I want to tell you the truth
But it seems you like it
When i say you're so pretty

Your laugh
It's zero star out of five
But i won't tell you
My lies, as you can see
Makes me nice
Pretend i was being honest
Won't it makes you mad?

I want to tell you the truth
But it seems you like it
When i say you're so pretty

I want to tell you the truth
But it seems you like it
When i say you're so pretty
Baby, if you're happy i'll keep my falsity

Salah kayanya tuh
Hah
